innerPlanets.name: Mars
innerPlanets.description: Don't forget to pack your hiking boots. You'll need them to tackle Olympus Mons, the tallest planetary mountain in our solar system. It's two and a half times the size of Everest!

innerPlanets.name: Venus
innerPlanets.description: Embark on an otherworldly adventure to Venus, the scorching hot paradise of our solar system. Brace yourself for the extreme temperatures that can melt lead, and immerse yourself in its dense atmosphere.

innerPlanets.name: Mercury
innerPlanets.description: Prepare for an extraordinary journey to Mercury, the mysterious and elusive planet of our solar system. Experience the thrill of being the closest planet to the Sun, as you navigate through its extreme temperature variations.

notableMoons.name: Ganymede
notableMoons.description: Our virtual tour will transport you to the jewel of Jupiter, where you'll float amidst the enchanting splendor of Ganymede's icy landscapes.

notableMoons.name: Titan
notableMoons.description: Journey to Titan, the ethereal moon of Saturn, where the allure of the unknown beckons. Immerse yourself in a virtual tour that unveils the grandeur of Titan's mesmerizing landscapes.

notableMoons.name: Europa
notableMoons.description: Delve into the mysteries of Europa's subsurface depths, where the tantalizing prospect of extraterrestrial life lingers.

transNeptunian.name: Pluto
transNeptunian.description: Encounter the dwarf planet Pluto, a celestial marvel boasting icy plains and towering mountains, revealing its majestic resilience in the face of the unknown.

transNeptunian.name: Eris
transNeptunian.description: Uncover the secrets of Eris, a distant world that challenges our understanding with its eccentric orbit and icy surface.

transNeptunian.name: Sedna
transNeptunian.description: Brace yourself for a captivating voyage to the depths of cosmic mystery, where Sedna's icy embrace beckons the curious and the adventurous.
